summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5046 for the improvement of East 72nd Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to Woodlawn Avenue, by widening roadway and paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 58030 as amended by Ordinance No. 58555, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
